title: Summer Z on Twitter
description: ““IA is missing from UX and Product.” I also noticed this is common in most of the workplaces, ppl only talk about visual designs until 1 true UX or IA person come to separate the structure. UX designers plz learn it🤓@ShopifyUX @biggeidea #WIAD2020 #WIAD2020Toronto #TheIAElement”
